https://tmrev.io/movie/703292-Death Threat 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hZMPVX63611n4SVcbzy04lsKZ7k.jpg In 2000 [Campus] went through several months of radiation treatment after being diagnosed with cancer. He created a three-part video piece about this harrowing experience called Death Threat, a powerful work about the images behind the images of life. It is his visual death poem, but thankfully, without the death. -Bill Viola Death Threat
